why do you need that? can't you just download it and see for yourself? you're not on a connection where you have to pay for every bit you download i hope? if so, then do not waste your money on this crap, do something useful with it. i don't know what the quality of this rip is because i haven't downloaded this one. i'm just going around leaving negative comments wherever i find this movie because watching it is worse than having a catheter 70 cms up your intestines. just trust me on that one. or watch the movie and then take a trip to a hospital to find out for yourself. anywayz, seeing as it has to be a dvdrip because this movie has only been released on dvd, the quality of the rip is probably good. so enjoy... or not.
